headline: Newswire
subtitle: Download the Digital Manual
content:
Download the Grand Theft Auto V Digital Manual to get a guide to gameplay, plus detailed information on the many neighborhoods and landmarks of Los Santos and Blaine County, all on your iOS or Android device or simply on your desktop.

Head to www.rockstargames.com/v/manual for download links, or search ‘GTAV Digital Manual’ in the App Store or Google Play Store.
